U

uninstall(Context, String) - Static method in class cn.trinea.android.common.util.PackageUtils
uninstall according conditions if system application or rooted, see PackageUtils.uninstallSilent(Context, String) else see PackageUtils.uninstallNormal(Context, String)
uninstallNormal(Context, String) - Static method in class cn.trinea.android.common.util.PackageUtils
uninstall package normal by system intent
uninstallSilent(Context, String) - Static method in class cn.trinea.android.common.util.PackageUtils
uninstall package and clear data of app silent by root
uninstallSilent(Context, String, boolean) - Static method in class cn.trinea.android.common.util.PackageUtils
uninstall package silent by root Attentions: Don't call this on the ui thread, it may costs some times.
URL_AND_PARA_SEPARATOR - Static variable in class cn.trinea.android.common.util.HttpUtils
url and para separator
utf8Encode(String) - Static method in class cn.trinea.android.common.util.StringUtils
encoded in utf-8 utf8Encode(null) = null utf8Encode("") = ""; utf8Encode("aa") = "aa"; utf8Encode("啊啊啊啊") = "%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A%E5%95%8A";
utf8Encode(String, String) - Static method in class cn.trinea.android.common.util.StringUtils
encoded in utf-8, if exception, return defultReturn
